title: krugurt
desc: Ultra lightweight view library to craft web components in HTML-level without messing with CSS styling

title: equilibrium
desc: Lightweight low-level time machine backup utility for Linux

title: golem-cli
desc: App manager for GOLEM to install, delete or kill apps in Terminal

desc: App directory for GOLEM pre-built native apps and ready to install in your Linux desktop. Go download them and make your Linux desktop beautiful again

desc: Software development kit to craft GOLEM apps out of thin air

title: scarv
desc: NumPy binary search engine for HTML-based scientific documentation that over hundered of page. A dream come true for static page

title: defreeze
desc: Surpress hogging processrs, limit cpu core per PID, eliminates freezing and smoothing entire Linux system

title: deployr
desc: Deploying payload (application or website) to 3-stages environment (local, staging, production) with GIT technologies

title: lyft
desc: Migration tool for settings and data incrementally for Linux Distributions

title: exile
desc: Reuses the existing default Android Studio SDK components, write some python codes, piece them together. Voila! It runs Android app almost seamlessly on Linux

title: echoes
desc: Smart and superthin web browser that mimic the Unity Desktop workspace, powered by AXON-AI and ElectronJS.

title: blackhole
desc: Super lightweight and insanely fast download accelerator for Terminal

title: arch-primitive-ion
desc: Ultra high performance network relay + ionizer + 3x acceleration for embedded system (commercially obsolete)

title: elixir-extension
desc: CRX & NEX browser extensions that swallows music and video on the web page you visit and display them in playlist

title: krunch
desc: Frontend toolkit to build modular and web component project

title: kraft.ui
desc: UI prototyping tool for high-fidelity web and mobile app prototypes wireframes. UI components can be very modular

title: yogurt
